Objects

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Objects.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card

    public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
implements Card
    The character class represents the characters involved in the game. It initializes holds their positions, name and code which is useful for getting and setting them in different rooms to suggest a murder scenario

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new Character object with initialized the start position on the board.
